name: Car Race Extreme Stunt Drive-r Sim-ulator
name_original: Car Race Extreme Stunt Drive-r Sim-ulator
description:
Car Race Extreme Stunts is a new, exciting racing car driving sim game. Race super fast remote control sports cars and speed on toy racetracks and stunts spread all through the house. Choose from a wide selection of cool RC racing cars, AVAILABLE NOW, FOR FREE!

Do you like driving fast and doing amazing jumps? You can do everything! Drive super fast powerful RC sports cars on extreme stunts jumps and tricks in the detailed house environment! Go drive fast cars, use supercharged boosts, pull off rubber burning drift, flip, roll, jump, and crash your RC car to experience one of the most amazing RC extreme car racing games!

Choose from a wide choice of incredible remote control racing cars and drive all over the house and it's extreme roads and stunts. With Car Race Extreme Stunts, you'll experience realistic car damage, try smashing your RC car into obstacles, crashing into walls and flipping by jumping of huge stunt ramps to see full body damage. With our latest extreme racing car simulator, speed off the biggest jumps, perform the fastest drifts, and zoom to top speeds in our latest exciting game, Car Race Extreme Stunts!
